Reviews.Author: Ciarra Wilson
Reviews.Content: I am extremely satisfied with my new t.v. It works perfectly and arrived in good time.

Reviews.Title: Good, But Sent It Back
Reviews.Author: WI DIY'r
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother in law to try as her first HDTV, to use in her kitchen.  That probably wasn't a great decision.  It is a nice "cheap" TV.  The sound is good, the SD and HD pictures are pretty good, and the remote is ok.  However, it is what it is - an inexpensive, lower line TV.  The quality of the picture from side to side and and up and down (as other reviewers have mentioned) degrades quickly.  Not a good property for a TV used in a room where the viewer is moving around quite a bit.  I ended up sending it back to Amazon for a refund.  As usual, Amazon was great and it was easy to return.If you are using it a room where you are viewing it generally straight-on, and you don't need a large TV, this will probably work fine for you.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 22" television 720p LCD
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Bennet "Ellen"
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly. Television in good packaging and without any damage. Great quality picture especially in the HD channels. Good size for smaller bedrooms.

Reviews.Title: Great picture and price.
Reviews.Author: shebre
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a spare bedroom and it is the perfect size for the room.  Picture is clear and it hooks up to a pc very easily.  It is extremely light and a great price.  Found it at the local store and it was $499 plus sales tax of about $35 so this was a great deal.  The only trouble I had was getting it to scan all the cable channels but I am sure that it is nothing that reading the manual wouldn't fix.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN22A451 22 inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Darby L. Price "darby price"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent HDTV, and i'm happy with it.  Because it is set further back from your eyes than a deeper standard TV set, the screen will appear smaller than a regular TV screen.  Therefore, you might want to get a larger screen, especially if you wall mount it.  I have it on a stand and sometimes i pull the screen a bit closer to me because i'm nearsighted.

Reviews.Title: great small tv
Reviews.Author: Bargain hunter "Appliance buyer"
Reviews.Content: Needed new tv for kitchen. This set fit the bill perfectly. Good picture. Good remote. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Kathleen J. Kettle "KJK"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love the Samsung LCD TV's.  We started with a 40", then purchased another 40" for the another bedroom.  The 22" went in the motorhome bedroom and the other went in the kitchen.  Just purchased another 30 inch for the family/pool room. Would have gone larger but it was all that would fit in the cabinet. We also are using a 19" as a monitor for our computer.All have bright, clear pictures, enough hook ups for all the gadgets. We have been using them for almost eight months with no problems. High Definition looks fantastic on these TVs, do not purchase for regular analog, it is not worth the cost as you will be disappointed with the picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 22" LCD T.V.
Reviews.Author: Michael C. Froelich "A Sailing Guy"
Reviews.Content: This glossy black T.V. is not only attractive but has a great picture.  I use this unit for over the air broadcasts and I think Samsung has the best tuners out there.  This is the second Samsung set I have purchased.  The only criticism I have is the sleep timer on the remote.  One button operation would be an improvement.  Overall, a great T.V.

Reviews.Title: great set
Reviews.Author: W. C. Chatelain "the dog"
Reviews.Content: Everything good with this set.. Color , sound, and soon to be hooked up to HD form many programs..

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Jesse in CA
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a birthday present.  Recipient is pleased and uses it in a small room.  My take is that the picture is really crisp and clear, but that the sound quality is not the greatest.  That is, sounds "tinny," like it's sound out of a metal can.  However, birthday boy seems to think it's fine and that's what matters.

Reviews.Title: Great littleTV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "potrzebie"
Reviews.Content: Got it a couple of months ago.  Order the HDMI cable along with it.  I paid $40.00 at RS (comparatively cheap).  Great picture, not real loud, but you can add speakers easily.  I plugged it into cable and it automatically grouped channels together that would otherwise be scattered all over the "dial".  For instance, it groups Channel 6 (analog), Ch 6 Digital, Ch 6 SD (?) and Ch 6 HD.  DVDs played on inexpensive, up-converting Sony DVD player look great so far.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Grandmimi
Reviews.Content: Very Good Just what I was looking for, for my kitchen. Cheaper than stores.  Didn't have to pay shipping cost, which was deciding factor for buying from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: very pleased!
Reviews.Author: B. Walker "shopper"
Reviews.Content: This is the second Samsung TV I have bought and I love it!  I was so happy with the 46" I bought that I purchased this one for my bedroom.  It is clear, sharp, and the design is sleek.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 22 inch LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Bucyrusboy
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture, easy set up, and a real value for the price.Great TV for small room, den, or bedroom.  Also, looks attractiveeven just sitting there.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD
Reviews.Author: GRG "Forester"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV to place in my RV to get ready for the digital switch.  I have been able to test with one digital channel being broadcast in digital that I can receive over my RV antenna -- the picture is great!!!  The TV is as advertised.  I aam very pleased.

Reviews.Title: bad sound. Really bad sound.
Reviews.Author: gatoreh
Reviews.Content: Well if you want to buy this to hook up to a home theater system and don't care that buy itself it has really bad sound then there should be no problems. My TV had a problem with the screen and so it was sent back but i don't suppose that is a usual problem so i wouldn't let that bother you.

Reviews.Title: tragedy
Reviews.Author: okfuskee
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv and had it at home for 31 days before it developed a solid yellow vertical line. I Called Samsung and they told me to bring it to the official repair shop. After 2 weeks I called the shop - the tech is out the part is on order. A couple weeks later I called the shop - the tech is out the part is on order. A week later I called Samsung and they were shocked - shocked I tell you - to hear the shop had the set so long. they called the shop and later that day the shop called me. They forgot to order the part - ha ha ha! The TV had now been in the shop longer than it was in my home. They asked me if I was willing to wait for the part which should take less time than an exhange...I should have gone for the exchange, but I let them order the part. Now it is two weeks and a day later for a total of about 7 weeks and I called Samsung again. They called the shop and learned that it was repaired 8 days ago and they didn't call me because they only call on saturdays (ha ha ha) and the Magical "caller" guy was out. What a disaster. I kind of expect the tv to develop other problems now just so I can have the joy of taking it back to this shop....yippeeeee...whatever you do, do not buy Samsung.

Reviews.Title: No more stickers!
Reviews.Author: R. Emerson
Reviews.Content: The TV comes with a sticker on the front.  I have 3 Samsung TV's.  All three came with a sticker on the front; however, this last one caused a problem.  The first two stickers came right off with no residue left on the TV.  The third sticker's glue stayed on the TV frame when the sticker was removed.  I used all approved solutions to remove the glue from the frame, but it still lacked the shine and factory finished look as the rest of the frame.  Really, I used all the solutions and this was really stuck on the frame.  It may have been the heat from the delivery truck that caused the problem, but still, why put a sticker on the front of the TV.  Just an risk that could be avoided.  I am dealing with customer service now.  I will post again with the result.  Let's see if they do the right thing.
